// header.title: ETSI SOL017 mapping with IETF ACTN mapping: WIM Topology example
comment: TE router ids from 198.51.100.0/24 reserved for documentation by RFC5737
Single domain network 64511  reserved for documentation by RFC5398

// comment: PE-031: The PE node where Site#3 is attached where is located the ERP of the blacksmith workshop

ietf-te-topology:te.name: ge-0/0/6
// comment: used bearer-reference for service creation can be equal to inter-domain-plug-id
in used service creation example is INVENTORY-ID=FIBER:Site#3-ANVIL:10143

// comment: P-1: The P node of the backbone nexthop for PE-031 and for PE-076
3. ge-0/1/3 to backbone P-3 node nexthop for PE-235

// comment: P-2: The P node of the backbone

// comment: P-3: The P node of the backbone nexthop for PE-235
1. ge-0/3/1 to backbone P-1 node nexthop for PE-031 and PE-076

// comment: PE-076: The PE node attached via South access of Site#2 where is located the control system for the creation of the rocket propeller

ietf-te-topology:te.name: ge-0/0/3
// comment: used bearer-reference for service creation can be equal to inter-domain-plug-id
in used service creation example is INVENTORY-ID=FIBER:Site#2-BAILEY:90006

// comment: PE-235: The PE node attached via North access of Site#2 where is located the control system for the creation of the rocket propeller.

ietf-te-topology:te.name: ge-0/0/1
// comment: used bearer-reference for service creation can be equal to inter-domain-plug-id
in used service creation example is INVENTORY-ID=FIBER:Site#2-ACME:50003
